title: StandardAero Backers Said to Seek $1.6 Billion in Share Sale
description: A pair of StandardAero Inc.’s largest shareholders are seeking to raise as much as $1.6 billion in an offering of the aircraft maintenance services provider’s shares, according to people familiar with the matter.
content: A pair of StandardAero Inc.’s largest shareholders are seeking to raise as much as $1.6 billion in an offering of the aircraft maintenance services provider’s shares, according to people familiar with the matter.
